Texts.Chs: 喵！前哨站到处都是典当店，是吧？
Texts.Eng: Meow! The outpost is full of pawesome shops, huh?

Texts.Chs: 喵。我让你产生我是只普通的猫的错觉，不是吗？
Texts.Eng: Meow. ...I had you thinking I was a normal cat, didn't I?

Texts.Chs: 喵？那是什么？抱歉，这么多人会扰乱我的心灵感应。
Texts.Eng: Meow? What's that? Sorry, this thick crowd is messing with my telepathy.

Texts.Chs: 喵...前哨站有点冷，是吧？当然，猫咪们更喜欢温暖的地方！
Texts.Eng: Mew... The outpost is a bit chilly, huh? Cats prefer warm places, for sure!
